song.title: God is Able
song.lyrics:
[Intro] .A E F#m D
[1] . A E God is able, He will never fail .F#m D He is almighty God . A Greater than all we seek . E Greater than all we ask .F#m D E He has done great things
[C] . A E Lifted up He defeated the grave . F#m D Raised to life our God is able . A E In His Name we overcome . F#m D E For the Lord our God is able
--- ; Order 1 c 2 c b c(x2)
[2] . A E God is with us, God is on our side .F#m D He will make a way . A Far above all we know . E Far above all we hope .F#m Dadd9 E He has done great things
[Interlude] .A E F#m D
[B] . A E God is with us, He will go before . F#m E He will never leave us . D He will never leave us . A/C# E God is for us, He has open arms . F#m E He will never fail us . D He will never fail us
song.author: Hillsong Live
